SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CONSERVATION EASEMENTS - THE ORGANIZATION'S HISTORIC STRUCTURES ARE REPORTED AS PART OF THE BUILDING FIXED ASSET ACCOUNT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 2, PART V, LINE 4
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE INTENDED USE OF THE ENDOWMENT FUNDS ARE FOR SCHOLARSHIP FUNDS, GENERAL FUNDS, AND FACULTY ENRICHMENT FUNDS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 4, PART XI, LINE 4B
SCHEDULE D, PAGE 4, PART XII, LINE 4B

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: RACIALLY NONDISCRIMINATORY POLICY IS PUBLICIZED THROUGH STATE NEWSPAPERS BY AN ASSOCIATION OF WHICH DENVER ACADEMY, INC IS A MEMBER.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE I, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SCHOLARHIPS DENVER ACADEMY, INC. HIRES AN AGENCY, TADS, TO PROCESS SCHOLARSHIP APPLICATIONS AND DETERMINE NEED. DENVER ACADEMY THEN REVIEWS THESE FINDINGS AND MAKES A FINAL DETERMINATION REGARDING SCHOLARSHIPS GRANTED.

TaxExemptBondsIssuesGrp.PurposeDesc: CO EDUCATIONAL AND CULUTRAL FACILITIES AUTHORITY

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CO EDUCATIONAL AND CULTURAL CO EDUCATIONAL AND CULUTRAL FACILITIES AUTHORITY
COPY OF FORM 990 REVIEWED BY THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES PRIOR TO FILING.
ON A YEARLY BASIS THE COMMITTEE OF TRUSTEES MONITORS THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICIES, THROUGH THE USE OF CONFLICT OF INTEREST FORMS THAT ARE COMPLETED ANNUALLY.
COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD ANNUALLY REVIEWS THE HEADMASTER COMPENSATION.
HEADMASTER ANNUALLY REVIEWS THE OTHER KEY EMPLOYEES COMPENSATION.
FINANICAL AID -1,125,000 FINANCIAL AID 1,125,000 FINANCIAL AID 0

THE AUDIT AND FINANCE COMMITTEE OF DENVER ACADEMY MEETS ANNUALLY WITH THE INDEPENDENT CPA FIRM TO REVIEW THE RESULTS OF THE CURRENT AUDIT AND INTERAL CONTROL RECOMMENDATIONS, IF ANY. THE COMMITTEE ALSO ASSUMES THE ANNUAL RESPONSIBILITY OF APPROVING THE SELECTION OF THE AUDIT FIRM. THERE HAVE BEEN NO CHANGES TO THESE PROCESSES FOR THE PRIOR YEAR.
